description: Misfits originally formed in 1977 in New Jersey. Before breaking up in '83, the band released 2 albums and several singles which have now become highly sought-after collector's items. American Psycho, Misfits' 1st release of all new material in 13 years, was produced by Daniel Rey (The Ramones) and is full of the melodic rock anthems, punk fervor and ghoulish themes that have always been the band's trademark. Key tracks: "Dig Up Her Bones," "Shining" and the title track.
title: American Psycho
